content: Questions associated with Touchstone R3 FHIR Testing can be found here. We are currently working to trial R3-Basic-Test-Scripts, R3-Connectathon-15-Test-Scripts and R3-Advanced-Test-Scripts.

Thanks Mario/Richard. I've run my server through its paces on Touchstone, great work.
Have only found 1 issue with the tool so far. Reported to Richard already.
